name: friend-finder
description: - A full-stack site that will take in results from the users' surveys, then compare their answers with those from other users - The app will then display the name and picture of the user with the best overall match ## How will the routing work? - Express will handle routing - Then the app will be deployed to Heroku so other users can fill it out ## Instructions - Survey will have 10 questions   - each answer will be on a scale of 1 to 5 based on how uch the user agrees or disagrees with a question
author: Caitlyn
